SELECT STORE_ID, STORE_NAME, STORE_NAME_REG, CASE WHEN LENGTH(TEL_NO) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,4,4),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,8,4)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,4,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,7,4)) END AS TEL_NO, SORT_RANK, REGISTRATION_NUMBER, CEO, ADDRESS, OPEN_DAY, CASE WHEN CLOSE_DAY = 'MON' THEN '매주 월요일' WHEN CLOSE_DAY = 'TUE' THEN '매주 화요일' WHEN CLOSE_DAY = 'WED' THEN '매주 수요일' WHEN CLOSE_DAY = 'THU' THEN '매주 목요일' WHEN CLOSE_DAY = 'FRI' THEN '매주 금요일' WHEN CLOSE_DAY = 'SAT' THEN '매주 토요일' WHEN CLOSE_DAY = 'SUN' THEN '매주 일요일' ELSE '휴무없음' END AS CLOSE_DAY, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'STORE_TYPE' AND CODE_KEY = STORE.STORE_TYPE) STORE_TYPE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'STORE_STATUS' AND CODE_KEY = STORE.STORE_STATUS) STORE_STATUS,
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(B.CODE_VALUE SEPARATOR ',') FROM STORE_PLAY A, COMMON_CODE B WHERE A.STORE_ID = STORE.STORE_ID AND A.PLAY_ID = B.CODE_KEY) PLAY_NAME, REGISTRATION_CERTIFICATE_IDX, PLAYGROUND_CERTIFICATE_IDX, INSURANCE_CERTIFICATE_IDX, ETC_FILE_1_IDX, ETC_FILE_2_IDX, ETC_FILE_3_IDX, ETC_FILE_4_IDX, THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_IDX, IMAGE_1_IDX, IMAGE_2_IDX, IMAGE_3_IDX, IMAGE_4_IDX, IMAGE_5_IDX, IMAGE_6_IDX, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE, UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') UPD_DATE FROM STORE ORDER BY SORT_RANK LIMIT #{startPage}, #{recordsPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE ( STORE_ID, STORE_NAME, STORE_NAME_REG, STORE_TYPE, TEL_NO, SORT_RANK, REGISTRATION_NUMBER, CEO, ADDRESS, OPEN_DAY, CLOSE_DAY, REGISTRATION_CERTIFICATE_IDX, PLAYGROUND_CERTIFICATE_IDX, INSURANCE_CERTIFICATE_IDX, ETC_FILE_1_IDX, ETC_FILE_2_IDX, ETC_FILE_3_IDX, ETC_FILE_4_IDX, THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_IDX, IMAGE_1_IDX, IMAGE_2_IDX, IMAGE_3_IDX, IMAGE_4_IDX, IMAGE_5_IDX, IMAGE_6_IDX, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{storeId}, #{storeName}, #{storeNameReg}, #{storeType}, #{telNo}, SORT_RANK_NEXTVAL(), #{registrationNumber}, #{ceo}, #{address}, #{openDay}, #{closeDay}, #{registrationCertificateIdx}, #{playgroundCertificateIdx}, #{insuranceCertificateIdx}, #{etcFile1Idx}, #{etcFile2Idx}, #{etcFile3Idx}, #{etcFile4Idx}, #{thumbnailImageIdx}, #{image1Idx}, #{image2Idx}, #{image3Idx}, #{image4Idx}, #{image5Idx}, #{image6Idx}, #{regId}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO STORE_PLAY( STORE_ID, PLAY_ID, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{storeId}, #{playId}, #{regId}, NOW() )
